name: HappyLittleHelper
0: ”Alexa, ask happy little helper to suggest me a painting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy little helper
des:
Ask this Happy Little Helper what painting you should do and it will return a random painting from a database of all Bob Ross "Joy of Painting" episodes and provide details on the episode, title of the painting, and the colors used in the process.

Future features will allow the user to provide the paints they own and have a list of paintings returned that use those paints.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
